alt-primary.help: Alternate primary DNS server. This is not used as a failover DNS server.
alt-primary.name: alt-primary

alt-secondary.help: Alternate secondary DNS server. This is not used as a failover DNS server.
alt-secondary.name: alt-secondary

interface.help: Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface.name: interface

interface-select-method.help: Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-method.name: interface-select-method

options.help: Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
options.name: sdwan

ip6-primary.help: Primary IPv6 DNS server IP address for the VDOM.
ip6-primary.name: ip6-primary

ip6-secondary.help: Secondary IPv6 DNS server IP address for the VDOM.
ip6-secondary.name: ip6-secondary

primary.help: Primary DNS server IP address for the VDOM.
primary.name: primary

options.help: DNS over UDP/53, DNS over TCP/53.
options.name: cleartext

secondary.help: Secondary DNS server IP address for the VDOM.
secondary.name: secondary

hostname.help: DNS server host name list separated by space (maximum 4 domains).
hostname.name: hostname

server-select-method.help: Specify how configured servers are prioritized.
server-select-method.name: server-select-method

options.help: Select servers based on least round trip time.
options.name: least-rtt

options.help: Select servers based on the order they are configured.
options.name: failover

source-ip.help: Source IP for communications with the DNS server.
source-ip.name: source-ip

ssl-certificate.help: Name of local certificate for SSL connections.
ssl-certificate.name: ssl-certificate

vdom-dns.help: Enable/disable configuring DNS servers for the current VDOM.
vdom-dns.name: vdom-dns

options.help: Enable configuring DNS servers for the current VDOM.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable configuring DNS servers for the current VDOM.
options.name: disable

results.help: Configure DNS servers for a non-management VDOM.
results.name: vdom-dns
